rsvp.title: S
rsvp.busFrom: Autobus per la stazione centrale alle fine de la serata?
rsvp.addAnother: Would you like to send another rsvp? Click

location.title: T
location.text: The ceremony, followed by the reception and dinner will be held at Sundby Gård. The address is Sundby Gårdsväg 5, 141 91 Huddinge
location.directions: How to get to the venue

car.title: Get here by car
car.directions: Just put the address in Google Maps and follow the directions to the venue. There is free parking on the premises.

bus.title: Get here by the chartered transportation
bus.directions: We have chartered a bus that will take you to Sundby Gård från Stockholm Central station. The bus will depart at XX.XX to make sure it is at the venue by 4.30 pm. There will also be a chartered bus at the very end of the evening which will depart around 2 am. If this sounds interesting to you, make sure you fill it in in your rsvp.

publicTransport.title: Get here with public transportation
publicTransport.directions: There are a few options for you. With bus 709 from Huddinge train station, get off at the station Sundby Gård. The other option is bus 865 from Flemingsberg's train station (or from Handenterminalen). It stops out on road 259 at the station Gladövägen, which is a 15 minute walk to the venue.

outdoor-indoor.title: A note on weather conditions
outdoor-indoor.ceremony: The ceremony will hopefully be held outdoors on a grass area. The coctail hour that will follow the ceremony will also be held partially outdoors. So you may want to bring a light jacket in case it gets a little cold. If it's pouring down rain, we will move the ceremony indoors but we will survive outdoors in case of little drops of rain. The rest of the evening will take place indoors.
